title: List of commands
description: For more information, use `info`, `links` or call Customer support: `$t(common:prefix)dial *611`

fields.name: Get yourself a number to call others!
fields.value: Do `$t(common:prefix)wizard` and follow the prompts. Once you got one, you can...

fields.name: $t(common:prefix)dial / $t(common:prefix)call
fields.value: Dial a specific DiscordTel number you have in mind. Or...
